brainly_data.question:
The _____ has approved genetically engineered medical treatments. 
Food and Drug Administration (FDA)
pharmaceutical industry
Healthcare Finance Administration (HCFA)
brainly_data.subject: Health

all_answers.question:
The _____ has approved genetically engineered medical treatments. 
Food and Drug Administration (FDA)
pharmaceutical industry
Healthcare Finance Administration (HCFA)
all_answers.subject: Health
all_answers.text: The pharmaceutical industry has approved genetically engineered medical treatments. These are companies that are mostly involved in providing the public with the necessary medications and treatments for numerous diseases. They agree on innovations on drug products and test these innovations for public consumption.
